data.text: @imemledger What behavior? You're not watching his films because of something he was accused of in... 1992? LOL!

@Nadie_lo_dijo @imemledger Yes, I’m curious as well, seeing as you don’t fit the typical Twitter WA hater profile, and actually have knowledge of his films. The facts of the case overwhelmingly support not his guilt, but Mia Farrow’s. Dylan is HER victim.

@imemledger You let yourself be swept away by what is most likely a false allegation. That is in itself good news: a child was *not* abused and a reason to dislike a fine director appears to be *not* valid.

Yet chances are that you won't admit this and *want* the allegation to be true. Why?
@imemledger And why are you so sure that he is a "bad man"?
